mapper.insert: insert into cy_pageInfo values(#{c_id}, #{c_name}, #{c_birth}, #{c_photo}, null, null, 'default', null, null, null, null)
mapper.update: update cy_pageInfo set p_name=#{p_name}, p_birth=#{p_birth}, p_photo=#{p_photo} where p_id=#{p_id}
update cy_pageInfo set p_profile=#{p_profile}, p_email=#{p_email}, p_sns=#{p_sns}, p_state=#{p_state} where p_id=#{p_id}
